### Setup

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(devtools)
install_github('ismayc/pnwflights14')
library(pnwflights14)
data(flights)
data(weather)
```

### Histogram

```{r}
ggplot(weather, aes(x = temp)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 60, col = 'white')
```

### Line Graph

```{r}
jan_temps <- dplyr::filter(weather, origin == "PDX", month == 1, day <= 15)
ggplot(jan_temps, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_line()
```

### Scatterplot

```{r}
ak <- dplyr::filter(flights, carrier == "AS", dep_delay < 500)
ggplot(ak, aes(x = dep_delay, y = arr_delay)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .1)
```

### Barplot

```{r}
ggplot(flights, aes(x = carrier)) +
  geom_bar()
airlines
```

### Boxplot

```{r}
ggplot(weather, aes(x = factor(month), y = temp)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
